name: Romb
body:
## Use prepackaged source
Get the packaged source code release from Download Packages section at [https://github.com/apik/RoMB/downloads](https://github.com/apik/RoMB/downloads)
```
$ tar -jxvf RoMB-x.y.z.tar.bz2
$ cmake CmakeLists.txt
$ make
```

## Use code repository
Get complete code repository by git clone
```
$ git clone git://github.com/apik/RoMB.git
$ cmake CmakeLists.txt
$ make
```
### Authors and Contributors

Andrey Pikelner (@apik)
Alexander Bednyakov (@bednya)

### Support or Contact
